Caption: Figure 3: Actor-by-actor from Unified Matrix
Mention:
The next step is visualization. For example, in Figure 3 (next page) the actor-by-actor cell from the meta-matrix extracted 
from the Mideast data is shown. Note: the nodes on the left are isolates – actors who are not directly linked to other actors. 
We note that the networks extracted are large and improved visualization is necessary. In Figure 3, the actor-by-actor sub-
matrix is shown and the isolates suppressed.
